collections.title: Developers and Engineers Prompts

promptTemplates.title: Code Debugging
promptTemplates.content: Help debug a piece of code in {developers_programming_language} that generates {developers_error_type}.

promptTemplates.title: API Integration Guide
promptTemplates.content: Write a guide on integrating the {developers_api_name} API into a {developers_programming_language} project.

promptTemplates.title: Optimization Strategy
promptTemplates.content: Suggest optimization strategies for a {developers_programming_language} application focusing on {developers_application_aspect}.
